mapper.sql: FOOD_MARKET_ID AS foodMarketId, FOOD_MARKET_CODE AS foodMarketCode, FOOD_MARKET_NAME AS foodMarketName, FOOD_MARKET_ADDRESS AS foodMarketAddress, FOOD_MARKET_LEVEL AS foodMarketLevel, SCOPE_TYPE AS scopeType, LGCS_AREA_ID AS lgcsAreaId, LGCS_AREA_CODE AS lgcsAreaCode, LGCS_AREA_NAME AS lgcsAreaName, ZONE_ID AS zoneId, ZONE_CODE AS zoneCode, ZONE_NAME AS zoneName, DISTRICT_ID AS districtId, DISTRICT_NAME AS districtName, DISTRICT_CODE AS districtCode, COVER_AREA AS coverArea, DEL_FLG AS delFlg, CRT_ID AS crtId, CRT_TIME AS crtTime, UPD_ID AS updId, UPD_TIME AS updTime, VERSION AS version
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BYMT_FOOD_MARKET_BASIC ( FOOD_MARKET_ID, FOOD_MARKET_CODE, FOOD_MARKET_NAME, FOOD_MARKET_ADDRESS, FOOD_MARKET_LEVEL, SCOPE_TYPE, LGCS_AREA_ID, LGCS_AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_NAME, ZONE_ID, ZONE_CODE, ZONE_NAME, DISTRICT_ID, DISTRICT_NAME, DISTRICT_CODE, COVER_AREA, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES (
#{foodMarketId}, #{foodMarketCode}, #{foodMarketName}, #{foodMarketAddress}, #{foodMarketLevel}, #{scopeType}, #{lgcsAreaId}, #{lgcsAreaCode}, #{lgcsAreaName}, #{zoneId}, #{zoneCode}, #{zoneName}, #{districtId}, #{districtName}, #{districtCode}, #{coverArea}, 0, #{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime}, 1 )

INSERT INTO BYMT_FOOD_MARKET_BASIC ( FOOD_MARKET_ID, FOOD_MARKET_CODE, FOOD_MARKET_NAME, FOOD_MARKET_ADDRESS, FOOD_MARKET_LEVEL, SCOPE_TYPE, LGCS_AREA_ID, LGCS_AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_NAME, ZONE_ID, ZONE_CODE, ZONE_NAME, DISTRICT_ID, DISTRICT_NAME, DISTRICT_CODE, COVER_AREA, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, VERSION ) VALUES
( #{param.foodMarketId}, #{param.foodMarketCode}, #{param.foodMarketName}, #{param.foodMarketAddress}, #{param.foodMarketLevel}, #{param.scopeType}, #{param.lgcsAreaId}, #{param.lgcsAreaCode}, #{param.lgcsAreaName}, #{param.zoneId}, #{param.zoneCode}, #{param.zoneName}, #{param.districtId}, #{param.districtName}, #{param.districtCode}, #{param.coverArea}, 0, #{param.crtId}, #{param.crtTime}, #{param.updId}, #{param.updTime}, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BYMT_FOOD_MARKET_BASIC SET
FOOD_MARKET_CODE = #{target.foodMarketCode},
FOOD_MARKET_NAME = #{target.foodMarketName},
FOOD_MARKET_ADDRESS = #{target.foodMarketAddress},
FOOD_MARKET_LEVEL = #{target.foodMarketLevel},
SCOPE_TYPE = #{target.scopeType},
LGCS_AREA_ID = #{target.lgcsAreaId},
LGCS_AREA_CODE = #{target.lgcsAreaCode},
LGCS_AREA_NAME = #{target.lgcsAreaName},
ZONE_ID = #{target.zoneId},
ZONE_CODE = #{target.zoneCode},
ZONE_NAME = #{target.zoneName},
DISTRICT_ID = #{target.districtId},
DISTRICT_NAME = #{target.districtName},
DISTRICT_CODE = #{target.districtCode},
COVER_AREA = #{target.coverArea},
DEL_FLG = #{target.delFlg},
VERSION = #{target.version},
UPD_ID = #{target.updId}, UPD_TIME = #{target.updTime} WHERE FOOD_MARKET_ID = #{filter.foodMarketId} AND DEL_FLG = false
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM BYMT_FOOD_MARKET_BASIC WHERE DEL_FLG = FALSE AND FOOD_MARKET_ID = #{foodMarketId}
